title.rendered: Third Annual Student Voices Event On April 24

content.rendered:
Third Annual Student Voices Event
When: Thursday, April 24 at 6:00 p.m.
Where: Lake Avenue Elementary School

The Saratoga Springs City School District invites all families and community members to attend the Third Annual Student Voices Event on April 24. This event is dedicated to celebrating and promoting inclusive, welcoming school communities.

This districtwide event brings together students, staff, and families to uplift student voices and highlight the many ways they contribute to making our schools more inclusive.

The evening will begin at 6:00 p.m. with a student panel in the auditorium, followed by an opportunity for attendees to visit tables hosted by student clubs and school committees from across the district.
